snippet: Because they had not been allowed to review the findings, the family of Joe Paterno said in a statement, their viewpoint would not be properly reflected.
abstract: Family of Joe Paterno questions the integrity of report on Penn State's role in the child abuse case involving former football assistant Jerry Sandusky; says their viewpoint is not be properly reflected, since they were not allowed to review the findings.
lead_paragraph: Because they had not been allowed to review the findings, the family of Joe Paterno said in a statement, their viewpoint would not be properly reflected.

headline.seo: Paterno Family Questions Inquiry of Penn State’s Role in Scandal
headline.main: Paterno Family Questions Inquiry of Penn State’s Role in Scandal
headline.print_headline: Paterno Family Questions Inquiry of Penn State’s Role in Scandal
